job.title: Data Scientist- Tiktok Ads
job.description: pTikTok is the leading destination for shortform mobile video Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles New York London Paris Berlin Dubai Mumbai Singapore Jakarta Seoul and Tokyo ppbrppAbout The Tiktok Monetization Product Data Science TeamppWere the TikTok Monetization Products data science team who enables and champions data driven decision making Our Vision is to become the world class data science team where data is used rigorously to drive all decision making Our Mission is to drive monetization and sustainable revenue growth for TikTok through data scienceppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpp Apply your expertise in quantitative analysis data mining and the presentation of data to see beyond the numbers and understand how our users interact with our ads productspp Partner with Product and Engineering teams to solve problems and identify trends and opportunitiespp Inform influence support and execute our product decisionspp Buildmaintain reports dashboards and metrics to monitor the performance of our productspp Mine massive amounts of data and extract useful product insightspp Manage development of data resources gather requirements organize sources and support product launchesppbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpp 5 years experience doing quantitative analysispp BABS in Math Statistics Economics Computer Science or other quantitative field Advanced degrees preferred but not requiredpp Fluency in SQL or other programming languages Some development experience in at least one scripting language PHP Python Perl etcpp Experience with large data sets and distributed computing HiveHadoop a pluspp Ability to initiate and drive projects to completion with minimal guidancepp The ability to communicate the results of analyses in a clear and effective mannerpp Basic understanding of statistical analysisp
